focus_area_list: Manage direct reports using Jira and GitHub to define and triage work, delegate tasks, and monitor progress
Create a style guide and establish standards for documentation contributions using topic-based authoring
Use an example repository and custom teaching materials to teach writers how to contribute using a docs-as-code workflow
Define job descriptions, work with recruiting staff to advertise, interview, and hire full-time writers in both the US and India
Authored documentation and release notes for 88 (and counting) Portworx Enterprise Kubernetes storage platform releases and hotfixes spanning a $32M series C through a $370M exit
Expanded Portworx documentation from a single product to multiple spanning new product lines; launched PX-Backup 1.0 documentation and handed-off further releases to direct report
Upgraded static site generator version and refactored legacy code to address regressions in order to enable support for AsciiDoc alongside Markdown
Expanded documentation architecture to support new independently versioned products through containerization
Refactored Algolia InstantSearch and implemented federated search, allowing users to search and instantly see results across multiple products
Created and maintained support documentation for the Celtra Management Platform
Performed front end development and administrative tasks for support.celtra.com
Created interactive website documentation designs such as animated tables, feedback buttons and forms, and landing pages using Javascript
Created and maintained documentation as sole writer for the Red Hat 3scale API Management Platform
Migrated documentation from legacy formats to AsciiDoc and placed into GitLab repositories
Implemented documentation initiatives: modularity, open sourcing

Established a release publications team, designed a release process, and instructed team members on release procedures; during releases, delegated team tasks for product releases on my.vertica.com and oversaw publication operations
Created and maintained documentation for HPE Software cloud products, including backup/restore, connector, and configuration guides
Modernized documentation using topic-based authoring standards
Implemented and reported on analytics for the documentation and community using Googe Analytics
